# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [0.4.2] - 2025-11-19

### Bug Fixes

- Unify protobuf across C++ dependencies to resolve segfault

## [0.4.1] - 2025-11-18

### Bug Fixes

- Resolve protobuf ABI conflict in Nix build
- Skip tests in release workflow due to floating point precision issues
- Set build environment variables at job level

### Features

- Add desktop entries

## [0.4.0] - 2025-11-17

Initial release with desktop integration.
